description:
Hitman: World of Assassination is a stealth action game developed by IO Interactive.
Play as Agent 47, a genetically engineered assassin, and travel the globe to eliminate high-profile targets with creativity and precision.

0.3.0.description:
- Added target randomizer
- Added items from Bruce Lee Pack and Hitman v3.240.1
- Added manifest file in preperation for Archipelago 0.7.0
- Added Goal information to H2 Menu
- Added Option Groups in yaml
- Fixed premature goaling again, since "disconnect" is not called connection failed
- Fixed names of options
- Removed anti-cheat which was already covered by new contract-id-checking

0.4.0.description:
- Added Split Itemsanity
- Added Options to set completion checks for each level individually

0.5.0.description:
- Added contract-collection-level-completion goal
- Added checks for Eliminating each Target
- Added Item and Location groups
- Added Random Complications option
- Added excluded_items and excluded_starting_items Option
- Changed random_targets option to be a range, so each level has a random number of targets
- Removed "Nothing"-Item and added the ability for filler items to be awarded multiple times 
- Removed the default Loadout from ICA Facility
- Spedup connection times drastically by removing DNS-lookup for "localhost"
- Reduced Situations Generation errors
- Fixed random Targets getting choosen multiple times for the same mission
- Fixed various spelling mistakes in YAML-settings
- Fixed "Itempickup - Lethal Pills" not awarding in Berlin
- Fixed Game crash when choosing invalid random Target
- Fixed Silent Assassin only considering beeing spotted while killing

0.5.1.description:
- Marked Suitcases as do not duplicate
- Fixed missing Target for contract error triggering for every target and not doing anything
- Added additional OptionError for too few locations
- Helped Generation out of restriced sphere 1 by deciding sphere 2 beforehand

0.6.0.description:
- Added Disguisesanity
- Added Ingame tracker in the form of challenges
- Added "Flamingo Photo" which allows the player to carry every unlocked item into a level
- Fixed spelling of Poison
- Fixed the Client getting stuck in a re-connection loop when an error occurred while connecting
- Fixed not being able to connect to a slot which has received too many items
- Fixed Erich Soders marking himself as a non-target, making Hokkaido SA checks impossible
   - He still marks himself as a non-target and causing the player to miss a 5-star rating, but in this case the SA check will still be sent
- Passed CLI args to Hitman Client
   - You can now directly connect to a slot by entering `ArchipelagoLauncher.exe "HITMAN World of Assasination Client" "--" "--connect" "slot:@archipelago.gg:port"` in the Command Line

0.6.1.description:
- Fixed CompletionChallanges not appearing in their right missions
- Increased maximum number of Contract Pieces to 200

0.6.2.description:
- Fixed crash when receiving "All Contract Pieces Collected"-check

Note: no changes were made to the apword from 0.6.1. If you have the 0.6.1 apworld installed, you don't need to reinstall it and can just replace the plugin.
Worlds made with 0.6.0 and 0.6.1 are compatible.

0.7.0.description:
- Added new Items from Game version v.3.250.0 and the Slim Shady DLC
- Added Default Suits for each Map to itempool
- Added checks for new Small Pumpkins in Colorado
- Added number of completions goal which requires beating X levels with a certain rating
- Changed Photo of a Flamingo to Item Packages
   - Item packages contain only items of one type (i.e. Pistol, Poison, Explosives etc.)
   - Item packages can be given in the starting inventory like before or shuffled into the itempool
- Double checked that no two-handed DLC items are included in one-handed Item Packages to avoid spawning with visible, illegal items.
- Added 2nd ass into the name

 - Tested all valid targets, removed inacessible or unreasonable ones and added a few new ones
    - removed Lion Forrest in Bangkok (Out of Bounds Golfer)
    - removed William Candler in Colorado (Hostage behind Bulletproof glass)
    - removed Carlton Smith in Hokkadio (Requires Electronic Key Hacker or Head doctor Disguise, which can't guarantee Suit Only is possible)
    - removed Danny Rice and Burt Gilbert in Isle of Sgail (Blind & Deaf Musicians on stage that cannot be lured)
    - removed Lorenz Specht in Berlin (Out of Bounds)
    - removed Huiqing Wen, Martin Brooke and Danny Ellington in Chongqing (Spawn only after data core hack, which requires Hush and Immogen Royce to be killed)
    - removed Jingfei Kang, Tingguang Dai and Ling Yin in Chongqing (Out of bound in Train station)
    - removed Jorge Giordano, Ira Ramirez and Javier Blanco in Mendoza (Understudies of the band members that onyl spawn when the original is killed)
    - added María Luisa Zamorano in Santa Fortuna
    - added Leonard Gore and Samantha Hunter in Dartmoor

- Fixed goaling being impossible if goal-check was collected
- Fixed goaling being impossible if goal-rating was not already a check in "level_with_check_for_x" option
- Fixed Client disconnecting when hinting or someone hinting an item in clients world
- Fixed two complications (accident only and no poison kill) being optional
- Removed All Bodies Hidden complication as it does not work with saves
- Tried to fix non_random_target-colorado not unlocking the exits and requiring entry into the tornado shelter


- Made error messages in client red for better discoverability
- Moved Peacock connection self test to before AP connection to avoid unnececery connection to Archipelago servers
- Stop making more connections to Peacock if connection already failed and the client disconnected

Please note that Peacock version v8.5.0 or later is required to run this version of the plugin.

0.7.1.description:
- Fixed Paris not being able to recieve random targets
- Fixed various Typos in the YAML

0.7.2.description: - Fixed generation error when using number_of_completions in non solo worlds

v0.2.description:
- Changed yaml to allow users to choose individual levels to include and exclude
- Fixed Client goal-ing when connecting to a new slot, if it was previously connected to a goal-ed without restarting.
- Added ANSI Art of the Archipelago Icon to the Peacock startup
- Added logic for Master-Difficulty
- Added more missing item depots
- Checked compatibility with Archipelago 0.6.3
v0.2.title: v0.2
